input.sentences: everyone got dressed up for the football game .
the bar was full of fans watching the game .
after the game everyone enjoyed the live music .
all the fans marched down the street at the end of the nights .
the police were there to make sure it did n't get out of hand .
output.sentences: Him and all of his friends watch the games together in a bar.
He is also a part of a band.

Although the cops end up getting called.
